o: Abstraction layer over JPA for data access

q: The ______ provides repository abstraction for data access.
Spring Data JPA reduces boilerplate code for repositories.

o: Java class mapped to database table

q: @Entity annotation marks a class as JPA entity.
What annotation marks a class as JPA entity?
The ______ annotation marks a class as database entity.
The ______ annotation marks primary key field.
The ______ strategy uses database identity column.

o: Entity mapped to 'users' table with auto-increment ID

q: @Column can specify column name, length, nullable.

c:
@Column(name = "email_address", nullable = false, unique = true)
private String email;

q: What is a Repository in Spring Data?

c:
public interface UserRepository extends JpaRepository<User, Long> {
}
o: Repository for User entity with Long ID

q: JpaRepository provides findAll, save, deleteById methods.
The ______ provides basic Create, Read, Update, Delete.
What is query method in Spring Data?
o: Method that generates query from name

q: Spring Data derives queries from method names.
What query does this method generate?
And keyword combines conditions in query methods.
What does Or keyword do in method name?
The ______ keyword creates OR condition in queries.
Containing creates LIKE with wildcards on both sides.
The ______ suffix finds boolean true values.
False suffix creates WHERE field = false.
The ______ keyword checks for null values.
IsNotNull creates WHERE field IS NOT NULL.

o: WHERE age BETWEEN start AND end
WHERE age >= start OR age <= end

q: What does OrderBy do in method name?

o: WHERE lastName = ? ORDER BY firstName ASC
WHERE lastName = ? ORDER BY firstName DESC

q: The ______ suffix sorts in ascending order.
What does Top or First keyword do?

o: SELECT ... ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT 5

q: The ______ returns single entity or null.
What is Distinct keyword used for?
What return type gets Optional result?
Optional prevents null pointer for single result.

c:
@Query("SELECT u FROM User u WHERE u.email LIKE %:domain")
List<User> findByEmailDomain(@Param("domain") String domain);
o: Custom JPQL query with named parameter

q: The ______ is object-oriented query language for JPA.

c:
@Query(value = "SELECT * FROM users WHERE email = ?1", nativeQuery = true)
User findByEmailNative(String email);

q: The ______ annotation binds method parameter to query.
What is Pageable in Spring Data?
Pageable contains page number, size, and sort.
What is Page in Spring Data?
Page contains content and pagination metadata.
The ______ returns total number of entities.
PageRequest.of(0, 10) creates first page with 10 items.
What is Slice in Spring Data?
Slice is more efficient than Page for large datasets.
What does hasNext() in Slice check?
What is Sort in Spring Data?
Sort.by creates Sort from property names.

o: Descending sort by createdAt then name

q: The ______ specifies sort direction and properties.

o: Many entities relate to one entity

q: @ManyToOne creates foreign key in owning table.

o: Many orders belong to one customer
One entity relates to many entities
Customer has many orders, mapped by Order.customer
Many entities relate to many entities
One entity relates to exactly one entity

q: The ______ names the foreign key column.
What is fetch type in JPA?
What is default fetch type for @ManyToOne?

o: Saves related entities when parent saved
Deletes related entities when parent deleted
Merges related entities when parent merged

q: orphanRemoval = true deletes when removed from collection.

c:
@OneToMany(mappedBy = "parent", cascade = CascadeType.ALL, orphanRemoval = true)
private List<Child> children;

q: The ______ removes entities not in collection.

o: Marks class as embeddable value type
Embeddable value object with street and city

q: @Transient fields are not stored in database.
@Temporal is not needed for Java 8+ date types.
The ______ stores both date and time.
The ______ enum type is safer for refactoring.

o: Makes entity managed and schedules insert
Returns managed copy of detached entity

q: merge() is for updating detached entities.
getReference() may throw exception on access if not found.
refresh() overwrites entity changes from database.
The ______ automatically syncs changes to database.

o: Before query execution and transaction commit

q: What exception is thrown on version conflict?

o: Exclusive write lock preventing concurrent access

q: What is Specification in Spring Data?
Specifications can be combined with and() and or().

o: Finds users named John who are active

q: The ______ method combines specifications with AND.
Criteria API is type-safe alternative to JPQL.
CriteriaQuery defines SELECT, WHERE, ORDER BY.
What is Root in Criteria API?
o: Entry point for query, represents entity

q: What is Predicate in Criteria API?
Querydsl generates Q classes for type-safe queries.

o: Specifies packages to scan for repositories

q: What provides user info for auditing?

o: One query for parent, N queries for each child
Fetches customers with orders and items in one query

q: The ______ annotation defines eager fetch relationships.
What is JOIN FETCH in JPQL?
o: Eager loading with JOIN in single query

q: JOIN FETCH loads related entities in one query.

c:
@Query("SELECT c FROM Customer c JOIN FETCH c.orders")
List<Customer> findAllWithOrders();
o: Loads customers and orders in single query

q: Second-level cache is shared across sessions.

o: Business key that uniquely identifies entity
Entity with synthetic ID and natural business key

c:
@Formula("(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM orders o WHERE o.customer_id = id)")
private int orderCount;

q: The ______ converts entity attribute to database column.

o: Composite primary key as embedded object

q: The ______ defines composite key via embeddable.

o: All classes in one table with discriminator

q: SINGLE_TABLE is most efficient for queries.

o: Separate table for each class, joined by key
Complete table for each concrete class
Value for this class in discriminator

q: The ______ specifies discriminator value for entity.

o: Non-entity parent class with mapped fields
Provides common fields without being entity
Set of strings in separate table

q: @CollectionTable specifies foreign key and table name.
The ______ stores map keys in separate column.
What is Projections in Spring Data?

o: Interface with getter methods for fields

q: The ______ projection uses interface with getters.

o: Returns projection with only firstName, lastName
DTO class with constructor matching fields

q: The ______ projection allows choosing type at runtime.

o: Dynamic projection based on passed class

q: Open projections can compute values with SpEL.

o: Computes full name from firstName and lastName

q: The ______ projection uses SpEL for computed values.
Spring Data REST exposes repositories as REST endpoints.
The ______ annotation configures REST path and exposure.

o: Hides repository or method from REST

q: exported = false hides from REST API.

o: Runs before entity creation via REST

q: What naming convention does Flyway use?
The ______ prefix indicates a versioned migration.
Where does Flyway look for migrations by default?
The ______ is alternative to Flyway for migrations.
The ______ value only validates schema without changes.
show-sql=true logs all SQL to console.

o: Default connection pool in Spring Boot

q: HikariCP is fastest JDBC connection pool.

o: Time to wait for connection from pool
Time before idle connection is removed

q: What database does @DataJpaTest use by default?
The ______ annotation replaces datasource for testing.
persistFlushFind returns fresh entity from database.
@Sql can setup test data from scripts.

o: When to run script: before or after test

q: BEFORE_TEST_METHOD runs script before each test.
Spring Data MongoDB provides repository support.
The ______ annotation stores entity as Redis hash.
What is reactive repositories in Spring Data?
The ______ provides reactive SQL database access.
Custom implementation class uses Impl suffix.
The ______ suffix is convention for custom implementation.

o: Custom shared repository with common methods

q: The ______ marks repository as base interface only.
Rearrange Spring Data JPA query priority:
The ______ builds query from non-null entity fields.
ExampleMatcher can ignore case and null values.

o: Finds all users with lastName Smith
Default number of items per page

q: The ______ limits page size to prevent performance issues.
What request parameters does Pageable bind to?
What is ScrollPosition in Spring Data?
Keyset pagination is more efficient for large datasets.
What is Window in Spring Data?
Driver class is auto-detected from URL.

o: Name of stored procedure to call

q: The ______ attribute names the stored procedure.

o: Defines stored procedure in entity metadata

q: What is batch processing in JPA?

o: Orders inserts by entity type for batching

q: order_inserts groups statements for efficient batching.

o: Session without caching for bulk operations

q: StatelessSession is ideal for bulk processing.

o: Hint for lazy collection fetching batch size

q: @BatchSize reduces N+1 by batching lazy loads.
The ______ fetches all collections in single query.
open-in-view=true is default but can cause issues.

o: To prevent lazy loading in view layer

q: The ______ pattern holds session too long.
